participant_1.background:
I read fantasy fiction novels on a rainy day to escape the real world and immerse myself in another.
i work at the deli counter.
I drive my Prius to the beach to relax and enjoy the ocean.
i work 60 hours a week.
I'm not rich, but I do take care of my health.

participant_2.background:
I'm a passionate artist who's been through a lot in love, but I keep drawing and creating because it's my passion.
I like to take drives in my classic car and listen to the engine rumble.
I once got food poisoning from a cheeseburger at a diner in the Midwest.
i am a volunteer firefighter.
I enjoy reading books to distract myself from pain.

content.text: Hey, how's it going?
Good, just got off work. You?
Good, just got home from the beach.
Oh, that sounds nice. I love going to the beach.
Yeah, it's my favorite place to relax. Do you have any hobbies?
I'm an artist and a volunteer firefighter. I also like to read books to distract myself from pain.
Oh, that's cool! I love reading too. I'm not much of an artist, but I enjoy drawing sometimes.
Drawing is a great way to relax and express yourself.
Yeah, it is. I like to draw fantasy characters and landscapes.
Oh, that sounds really cool. I'd love to see some of your drawings sometime.
Sure, I can show you some later. Do you have any favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different types of books, but I'm especially into historical fiction and fantasy novels.
Oh, that's cool. I like historical fiction too. What are some of your favorite books?
I really like the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon. It's a historical fiction series set in Scotland in the 1700s.
Oh, I've heard of that series. I've been meaning to check it out.
You should! It's really good.
Alright, I'll add it to my list. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm always happy to recommend books.
Well, I should probably get going. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a good night.
